name: Gun (itch) (Ariel Leyva)
description:
Made in 72 hours for the MiniJam 88

all assets are original except the music by Stevia Sphere and font by Magique Fonts

  • Point and click to move, you can reset a single level by pressing 'R' 
  • Blast your way into 15 levels, try to collect all the cherries and improve your time to get your best score!
  • Also, yes, not so much in terms of a story, but I tried, and I didn't have the time or talent to come up with a lot. Still, I hope you enjoy!
